name.jp: ラブリィクリスマスグローブ(男の子用)

description.en: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.ar: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.br: Celebre o espírito natalino em grande estilo. Talvez você ganhe um beijo de quem você ama!
description.cns: 也许你会从你爱的人那里得到一个吻！
description.de: Feiert die Weihnachtsstimmung mit Stil. Vielleicht bekommt ihr ja einen Kuss von der Person, die ihr liebt!
description.fi: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.fil: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.fr: Les chaussettes sont dépareillées mais maman s'en est rendue compte après coup. Tant pis !
description.id: Rayakan Holiday Spirit dengan gaya. Mungkin Anda akan mendapatkan ciuman dari orang yang Anda cintai!
description.it: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.jp: 休日気分で今日は贅沢にお祝いしよう！もしかしたら大好きなあの人からキスされちゃうかも！
description.kr: 휴일을 멋있게 축하해주세요. 어쩌면 사랑하는 사람에게 키스를 받을지도 몰라요!
description.nl: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.pl: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.ru: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.sp: Celebra el espíritu navideño con estilo. ¡Quizás recibas un beso de la persona que amas!
description.sw: Celebrate the Holiday Spirit in style. Perhaps you'll get a kiss from the one you love!
description.th: เฉลิมฉลองวันหยุดอย่างมีสไตล์ บางทีคุณอาจได้จูบจากคนที่คุณรัก!
description.tw: 以時尚的方式慶祝節日精神。也許你會從你愛的人那裡得到一個吻！
description.vi: Chào mừng Tinh thần Ngày lễ theo phong cách. Có lẽ bạn sẽ nhận được một nụ hôn từ người bạn yêu!
